name: R4B-goal-status-for-R3
title: Cross-version VS for R4B.GoalLifecycleStatus for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/goal-status|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R3. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R4B to R3.
